notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: XLZ and GZ conceived and designed the study; XLZ, GZ, and YH, participated in the collection of surveillance records and climatic data. GZ and YH conducted the data analysis. XLZ, DZ, and GZ drafted the manuscript. All authors were involved in the interpretation and discussion of the results and provided comments. All authors read and approved the final version of the manuscript.
